LanguageData.DroidSelfDestructPrompt: Are you sure you want to command this droid to self-destruct? This will destroy the droid and possibly cause an explosion.
LanguageData.DisableDescription: Click to disable this droid to save power.
LanguageData.DeactivateDialog: This will deactivate the droid, causing it to shut down. The only way to reactivate it is to have it hauled to a repair station. Continue?
LanguageData.SelfDestructDescription: Click to make this droid destroy itself.
LanguageData.DontStripBodiesDesc: Click to stop the droid from stripping bodies
LanguageData.StripBodiesDesc: Click to set the droid to strip bodies
